mapper.select: select b.* from (select u.pen,b.*,bt.btname,c.chapid,chaptime,c.chapname from users u,books b,booktype bt,roll r,chapter c, (select b.bookid from browse br,books b,roll r,chapter c where br.chapid=c.chapid and c.rollid=r.rollid and b.bookid=r.bookid and br.uuid=#{uuid} group by b.bookid)be where u.uuid=b.uuid and bt.btid=b.btid and b.bookid=r.bookid and r.rollid=c.rollid and be.bookid=b.bookid) b right join (select b.chapid,b.bookid,max(b.chaptime)time from (select b.bookid,c.chapname,c.chaptime,c.chapid from books b,roll r,chapter c,browse br where b.bookid=r.bookid and r.rollid=c.rollid and br.chapid=c.chapid and br.uuid=#{uuid} and c.chapstate=1 order by c.chaptime desc)b group by b.bookid) bb on bb.time = b.chaptime

select b.bookid,br.brid,bt.btname,b.bookname,b.bookstate,c.chaptime,u.pen,u.uuid, (select count(uuid) from bookrack where uuid=#{param1}) num from bookrack br inner join books b on br.bookid = b.bookid inner join booktype bt on bt.btid = b.btid inner join users u on u.uuid = b.uuid inner join roll r on r.bookid = b.bookid inner join chapter c on c.rollid = r.rollid where br.uuid = #{param1} and (b.bookname like concat('%',#{param2},'%') or u.pen like concat('%',#{param2},'%')) group by b.bookid order by c.chaptime desc
